thread.title: D C Losinski
thread.title_full: DoYouSpain.com evaluado por D C Losinski

author: D C Losinski
title: D C Losinski
text: Have been using Do You Spain for last 6 years and have always found them to offer the best deals and give you the car that was ordered. Straight forward process in booking, clear explanations on how the insurance, fuel policy and additional driver are calculated. I always take out their additional insurance as much cheaper than the ones offered by the car hire firm.
